content: Just wanted to make sure everyone was aware that the House and the White House both have different proposed pay raises. The House is seeking 3.4% and the Pres is looking for 2.9%. Both are posted on Military.com: http://www.military.com/benefits/military-pay/2010-military-pay-charts
